discovery_rule.description: Discovery of network interfaces as defined in global regular expression "Network interfaces for discovery".

discovery_rule.name: Windows service discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of Windows services of different types as defined in global regular expressions "Windows service names for discovery" and "Windows service startup states for discovery".

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types as defined in global regular expression "File systems for discovery".

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows Server Fortis:vm.memory.size[free].max(180)}<500M and {Template OS Windows Server Fortis:vm.memory.size[pavailable].max(180)}<5
trigger.recovery_expression: {Template OS Windows Server Fortis:vm.memory.size[free].min(180)}>500M and {Template OS Windows Server Fortis:vm.memory.size[pavailable].min(180)}>5
trigger.name: Lack of free memory

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows Server Fortis:vm.memory.size[free].max(180)}<1000M and {Template OS Windows Server Fortis:vm.memory.size[pavailable].max(180)}<10
trigger.name: Low free memory

dependency.name: Lack of free memory
dependency.expression: {Template OS Windows Server Fortis:vm.memory.size[free].max(180)}<500M and {Template OS Windows Server Fortis:vm.memory.size[pavailable].max(180)}<5
dependency.recovery_expression: {Template OS Windows Server Fortis:vm.memory.size[free].min(180)}>500M and {Template OS Windows Server Fortis:vm.memory.size[pavailable].min(180)}>5
